channel.title: [Delphi]Indy Components
channel.description:
[url=http://www.indyproject.org/Sockets/index.en.aspx]http://www.indyproject.org/Sockets/index.en.aspx[/url]
[QUOTE=indyproject.org]Indy.Sockets is an open source socket library that supports clients, servers, TCP, UDP, raw sockets, as well as over 100 higher level protocols such as SMTP, POP3, NNTP, HTTP, and many more. Indy.Sockets is available for C#, C++, Delphi, Visual Basic.NET, any .NET language, and Kylix. Indy.Sockets FCL build is a managed assembly and is compatible with the Microsoft .NET framework, and Mono.[/QUOTE]
Indy Components v8.0: Components: [url=http://www.nevrona.com/Indy/Downloads/Indy_8_22_Src_D6.zip]http://www.nevrona.com/Indy/Downloads/Indy_8_22_Src_D6.zip[/url] Source: [url=http://www.nevrona.com/indy/downloads/indy8_00_23.zip]http://www.nevrona.com/indy/downloads/indy8_00_23.zip[/url] Docs: [url=http://www.nevrona.com/indy/downloads/indyhelp_8_00_21_hlp.zip]http://www.nevrona.com/indy/downloads/indyhelp_8_00_21_hlp.zip[/url] Demos: [url=http://www.nevrona.com/indy/downloads/DelphiDemos20010311.zip]http://www.nevrona.com/indy/downloads/DelphiDemos20010311.zip[/url]
Indy Components v9.0.18: Components - Source: [url=http://www.indyproject.org/downloads/indy9.0.18_source.zip]http://www.indyproject.org/downloads/indy9.0.18_source.zip[/url] Docs: [url=http://www.projectindy.org/downloads/Indy-9-0-Help-WinHelp.zip]http://www.projectindy.org/downloads/Indy-9-0-Help-WinHelp.zip[/url] Demos: [url=http://www.projectindy.org/DemoDownloads/Indy9Demos_26Oct04.zip]http://www.projectindy.org/DemoDownloads/Indy9Demos_26Oct04.zip[/url]
Indy Components v10.1.5: Components: [url=http://www.atozed.com/indy/plus/install.iwp]http://www.atozed.com/indy/plus/install.iwp[/url] Source: [url=http://www.indyproject.org/downloads/10/indy10.0.52_source.zip]http://www.indyproject.org/downloads/10/indy10.0.52_source.zip[/url] Docs: [url=http://www.projectindy.org/downloads/IndyDocs_10.1.5.0_WinHelp.zip]http://www.projectindy.org/downloads/IndyDocs_10.1.5.0_WinHelp.zip[/url] Demos: - IdSTMPServer: [url=http://www.indyproject.org/DemoDownloads/Indy_10_SMTPServer.zip]http://www.indyproject.org/DemoDownloads/Indy_10_SMTPServer.zip[/url] - IdPOP3Server: [url=http://www.indyproject.org/DemoDownloads/Indy_10_POP3Server.zip]http://www.indyproject.org/DemoDownloads/Indy_10_POP3Server.zip[/url] - IdSMTPRelay: [url=http://www.indyproject.org/DemoDownloads/Indy_10_SMTPRelay.zip]http://www.indyproject.org/DemoDownloads/Indy_10_SMTPRelay.zip[/url] - IdFTP (FTP Client): [url=http://www.indyproject.org/DemoDownloads/Indy_10_FTPClient.zip]http://www.indyproject.org/DemoDownloads/Indy_10_FTPClient.zip[/url] - IdFTPServe: [url=http://www.indyproject.org/DemoDownloads/Indy_10_FTPServer.zip]http://www.indyproject.org/DemoDownloads/Indy_10_FTPServer.zip[/url] - IdIMAP4 (IMAP4 Client): [url=http://www.indyproject.org/DemoDownloads/Indy_10_IMAP4Client.zip]http://www.indyproject.org/DemoDownloads/Indy_10_IMAP4Client.zip[/url] - IdPOP3 / IdSMTP / IdMessage: [url=http://www.indyproject.org/DemoDownloads/Indy_10_MailClient.zip]http://www.indyproject.org/DemoDownloads/Indy_10_MailClient.zip[/url]
(This is certainly useful for Delphi 7 SE users since it doesnt include the indy components)

item.title: [Delphi]Indy Components
item.dc:creator: @Freddy1990 Freddy1990
item.description:
@Freddy1990 wrote:

http://www.indyproject.org/Sockets/index.en.aspx

indyproject.org:

Indy.Sockets is an open source socket library that supports clients, servers, TCP, UDP, raw sockets, as well as over 100 higher level protocols such as SMTP, POP3, NNTP, HTTP, and many more. Indy.Sockets is available for C#, C++, Delphi, Visual Basic.NET, any .NET language, and Kylix. Indy.Sockets FCL build is a managed assembly and is compatible with the Microsoft .NET framework, and Mono.

Indy Components v8.0:
Components: http://www.nevrona.com/Indy/Downloads/Indy_8_22_Src_D6.zip
Source: http://www.nevrona.com/indy/downloads/indy8_00_23.zip
Docs: http://www.nevrona.com/indy/downloads/indyhelp_8_00_21_hlp.zip
Demos: http://www.nevrona.com/indy/downloads/DelphiDemos20010311.zip

Indy Components v9.0.18:
Components - Source: http://www.indyproject.org/downloads/indy9.0.18_source.zip
Docs: http://www.projectindy.org/downloads/Indy-9-0-Help-WinHelp.zip
Demos: http://www.projectindy.org/DemoDownloads/Indy9Demos_26Oct04.zip

Indy Components v10.1.5:
Components: http://www.atozed.com/indy/plus/install.iwp
Source: http://www.indyproject.org/downloads/10/indy10.0.52_source.zip
Docs: http://www.projectindy.org/downloads/IndyDocs_10.1.5.0_WinHelp.zip
Demos:

  • IdSTMPServer: http://www.indyproject.org/DemoDownloads/Indy_10_SMTPServer.zip
  • IdPOP3Server: http://www.indyproject.org/DemoDownloads/Indy_10_POP3Server.zip
  • IdSMTPRelay: http://www.indyproject.org/DemoDownloads/Indy_10_SMTPRelay.zip
  • IdFTP (FTP Client): http://www.indyproject.org/DemoDownloads/Indy_10_FTPClient.zip
  • IdFTPServe: http://www.indyproject.org/DemoDownloads/Indy_10_FTPServer.zip
  • IdIMAP4 (IMAP4 Client): http://www.indyproject.org/DemoDownloads/Indy_10_IMAP4Client.zip
  • IdPOP3 / IdSMTP / IdMessage: http://www.indyproject.org/DemoDownloads/Indy_10_MailClient.zip

(This is certainly useful for Delphi 7 SE users since it doesnt include the indy components)
